column4: I noticed they switch firefox to the gnome theme by default in hoary
does anyone know if they're any plans to make a more united theme?
I'm not informed, but I'd think so, yeah. The entire artwork got an overhaul
do you know the wiki url for the artwork in progress?
I'm a 'testing' junk, but both of my hoary installs on this machine went down yesterday. I'm now running a nice and tranquil warty
